title: Quillian The Devil's Son
author: Lisa
summary: On the eve of battle, a vow binds two fates.

title: Myriador
author: Lisa
summary: In a realm torn between faith and shadow, dark elves, Christians, and humans clash against an ancient evil that hungers for their souls. As alliances crumble and beliefs collide, one prophecy may be all that stands between salvation and eternal night.
